msg_color_scheme_invalid: Invalid color scheme file. Please check your file format.
msg_game_map_invalid: Invalid game map file. Please check your file format.
msg_clear_all: All user data purged. Refresh the app to take effect.
msg_export_settings_succ: Settings exported. Check downloads for file.
typ_assistance_grid_helper: Controls whether to display an assistance grid in the background to remove some difficulties.
typ_border_thickness_helper: Controls thickness of borders around cells in pixels.
typ_color_scheme_helper: Controls the color scheme of Periotris in JSON.
typ_game_map_helper: Controls the in-game periodic table layout in JSON.
typ_update_interval_helper: Controls the interval between two game ticks.
typ_export_settings_helper: Save settings to a local file in JSON.
typ_clear_all_helper: Delete all saved settings and progress, then reset the app.
